title: War In The Pacific National Historical Park: Fonte Plateau Unit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go     Fonte Plateau Unit              Fonte Plateau Unit         Fonte Plateau NPS Photo  Once a Japanese naval communications center, Fonte Plateau unit is located on Nimitz Hill, overlooking Asan Bay. Site of one of the more bitter battles between the U.S. Marines and the Japanese, the high land of Fonte Plateau, later renamed to Nimitz Hill, was once the CINCPAC headquarters for Admiral Chester Nimitz.
